Message.En: A Whirling Hawk on a Dark Night

<COL ffdc78>(Enemy appears at night)</COL>
Defeat the enemies encountered
Message.Jp:
<COL ffdc78>【 敵出現：夜 】</COL>
遭遇した敵を討伐する

Message.En:
In the <NAME AREA>, 
it seems that the residents are being threatened 
by a dangerous presence that appears at night.
Message.Jp:
<NAME AREA>では、夜になると現れる
危険な存在により住民が脅かされているらしい

Message.En:
<COL ffdc78>【Enemy appears during: Night】</COL>
My brother went out after saying that he saw a 
suspicious shadow near our house at night, 
and he hasn't returned. It's been a while... 

My brother is an aspiring knight and he has 
confidence in his skills... 

Ah, I should have stopped him!
Message.Jp:
<COL ffdc78>【 敵出現：夜 】</COL>
夜中に家の近くに怪しい影が横切ったと言って
兄が出て行ったきり、帰ってきません
もうずいぶんになります――
兄は騎士見習いをしていて腕に自信があるはず
だったのですが――あぁ、止めるべきでした！
遭遇した敵を討伐する
